snippet: With her images of half-nibbled sweets and crumb-strewn tablecloths, Laura Letinsky has taken the discussion on photography to a different realm: food.
abstract: Lisa Letinsky, fashion photographer who has shifted her attention to capturing images of food in half-eaten and imperfect states, has found herself increasingly in demand by gourmet food publications.
lead_paragraph: With her images of half-nibbled sweets and crumb-strewn tablecloths, Laura Letinsky has taken the discussion on photography to a different realm: food.

headline.main: Giving Leftovers a New Place at the Table
headline.print_headline: Giving Leftovers A New Place At the Table
